    • pageFormat

      public org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.common.PDRectangle pageFormat()
      Description copied from class: StyleGuide
      Defines the page format of the style guide. For example, MLA9 uses standard, white 8.5 x 11-inch paper.
      Specified by:
      pageFormat in class StyleGuide
      Returns:
      - the PDRectangle constant that the creator class should apply

    • font

      public org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.font.PDFont font()
      Description copied from class: StyleGuide
      Determines the main font of the style guide. The main font is used for the default text provided by the user.
      Specified by:
      font in class StyleGuide
      Returns:
      - the PDFont that should be used by the creator class

    • fontSize

      public int fontSize()
      Description copied from class: StyleGuide

      Specified by:

      Returns:
      - the font size as an integer

      public Color fontColour()
      Description copied from class: StyleGuide

    • sentencePrefix

      public String sentencePrefix()
      Description copied from class: StyleGuide
      Determines the string that will be inserted before every single sentence. In most style guides this is used to insert a space or tab before every sentence.
      Specified by:
      sentencePrefix in class StyleGuide
      Returns:

    • requiredStructureBeforeEndnotes

      public StructureType requiredStructureBeforeEndnotes()
      Description copied from class: StyleGuide
      Determines the type of structure that needs to appear in the document, before the user can use the endnotes structure. If no structure needs to appear first, this can be null.
      Specified by:
      requiredStructureBeforeEndnotes in class StyleGuide
      Returns:
      - the structure that should appear first as a StructureType constant

    • documentType

      public DocumentType documentType()
      Description copied from class: StyleGuide
      Determines the default document type specified by the style guide. For most style guides, this would be PAPER.
      Specified by:
      documentType in class StyleGuide
      Returns:
      - the default document type as a DocumentType constant.

    • formatText

      public String formatText(String textBlock)
      Description copied from class: StyleGuide
      Defines how the style sheet formats a simple text. Examples could include adding exactly one whitespace after a punctuation mark.
      Specified by:
      formatText in class StyleGuide
      Parameters:
      textBlock - - the text block content with the enclosing quotation marks removed
      Returns:
      - returns the formatted text content as it will be forwarded to the paragraph formatter.

    • formatParagraph

      public String formatParagraph(String[] formattedTextBlocks)
      Description copied from class: StyleGuide
      Defines how the style sheet formats a paragraph block. Examples could include indenting the first sentence.
      Specified by:
      formatParagraph in class StyleGuide
      Parameters:
      formattedTextBlocks - - All text blocks of the paragraph already formatted.
      Returns:
      - the formatted paragraph content as it will be rendered in the document.

    • dateToString

      @NonNull public @NonNull String dateToString(@NonNull @NonNull LocalDate date)
      Description copied from class: StyleGuide
      Defines how the style sheet represents a date. It may choose to use its default representation or create a custom string. For example, MLA would use June 3, 1998.
      Specified by:
      dateToString in class StyleGuide
      Parameters:
      date - - the date as a LocalDate, which needs to be turned into a string
      Returns:
      - the date in the text format specified by the style guide
